home.aboutFrame6: My passion for IT comes from the belief that digital technology continues to transform the way we live, work, and communicate,and I chose to pursue a career in IT to be an actor in this evolution.
home.aboutFrame7: On this site, I will share the projects I work on in my free time, as well as those I carry out as part of my studies.

project.conflisticDesc: This project involved developing a mobile application, specifically a serious game, based on the construction of warehouses in a city. Participants were required to vote for the warehouse locations, advocating for their interests regarding the city's positioning. The application supported a multi-user system where each person played on their own device.
project.internshipMobileDesc: This mobile application developed in collaboration aims to facilitate the application process for internship opportunities. It consumes a REST API developed and deployed on Heroku, enabling users to search for and apply to internship listings. Its goal is to streamline the internship search and application process.
project.internshipWebAppDesc: The web application that inspired the mobile version was imposed by the school, and there was no connection between their development. It was designed to help users search and apply for internships online. The platform allows users to browse, filter, and apply to internship offers, and includes features like profile management and access to useful resources.
project.calendarDesc: This project consisted of designing a solution to centralize events from various sources, notably via ICS files or URL links, to facilitate schedule management. The system automates the creation and sending of newsletters to keep users informed, while ensuring efficient synchronization of dates and appointments.

about.bioFrame2: , a developer passionate about building reliable, efficient, and well-structured software. What drives me is understanding how systems work and turning that understanding into simple, effective, and sustainable solutions.
about.educationDesc: My diverse academic background has allowed me to work on a wide range of projects — from web applications to more technical systems — while learning to make informed choices, discuss various technical aspects, and collaborate effectively with different teams. These experiences have shaped a pragmatic approach to development: understand first, structure next, then build.
about.experience: During my six-month internship at ITESOFT, I worked as a QA Engineer, where I discovered another crucial side of software development: testing and quality assurance. I learned to automate, analyze, and validate features with precision — always keeping reliability in mind.
about.techWatch: I dedicate time to continuous tech watch, mainly around React and Svelte, two frameworks I’m deeply exploring. I plan to dive into Angular and Vue as well, although the first two already take a big part of my focus.
about.goal: I’m looking for a new opportunity — a role where I can keep learning, tackle meaningful technical challenges, and contribute to projects that value precision and quality.
about.interests: Outside of coding, I enjoy reading, exploring new software engineering ideas, and connecting with other developers who share the same passion.
about.educationMsc: MSc - Computer Sc - ULHN - Le Havre(France)

contact.reachMeTitleDesc1: If you would like to contact me for any reason, whether to discuss collaborations or just to say hello, don't hesitate to send me a message at the following e-mail address
contact.reachMeTitleDesc2: or use the contact form below. I try to answer all messages as soon as possible, so please forgive me if I don't respond immediately.
